SELECT Movie.id ,Movie.Name, Movie.Type, Movie.Rating, Movie.DistrFee, Movie.NumCopies FROM MovieQ INNER JOIN Movie ON MovieQ.MovieId = Movie.Id WHERE AccountId = #{id}

SELECT Movie.id ,Movie.Name, Movie.Type, Movie.Rating, Movie.DistrFee, Movie.NumCopies FROM Customer LEFT JOIN Account ON Customer.Id = Account.Customer LEFT JOIN Rental ON Account.Id = Rental.AccountId LEFT JOIN Movie ON Rental.MovieId = Movie.Id LEFT JOIN Orders ON Rental.OrderId = Orders.Id WHERE Customer.Id = #{customerId} AND Orders.ReturnDate IS NULL;
SELECT Movie.Name FROM Movie INNER JOIN AppearedIn ON Movie.id = AppearedIn.MovieId INNER JOIN Actor ON AppearedIn.ActorId = Actor.id WHERE Actor.Name = #{actorName};
